channel.title: Error on Server
channel.description:
I have followed the "creating provate server tutorial" by God twice and have followed all steps... I have enabled my server phalanxreqiuem.no-ip.org with port 43594 and opened it in network connections...I have no-ip running...I have local host runserver.bat file running...I am logged in...I have portforwarded 43594 port with belkin router...Why is my server still not working when my friends try to log on?
Do I have to create a server.bat file that runs my ip in no-ip or something???
Someone please help...I beg of you...One who helps will be awarded on my server

item.title: Error on Server
item.dc:creator: @dogzound5 dogzound5@gmail.com
item.description:

Do I have to create a server.bat file that runs my ip in no-ip or something???

Someone please help…I beg of you…One who helps will be awarded on my server
